message.heading: Let me show you my plan for sending you home. Please excuse the crudity of this model. I didn't have time to build it to scale or paint it.

message.heading: I've had enough practical jokes for one evening. Good night, future boy!

message.heading: I can't believe you'd loan me your car without telling me it had a blind spot. I could've been killed!
